mapper.select: select face.realname from face where face_id = '${value}'
mapper.sql: user_id, username, password, email, phone, image, validationState, province, sch_id, major, institute, sex, time, schoolname, scholar
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, username, password, email, phone, image, validationState, province, sch_id, major, institute, sex, time, schoolname, scholar ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validationstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{institute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scholar,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

user_id,
username,

email,
phone,
image,

province,

sex,

mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
validationState = #{validationstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sch_id = #{schId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
institute = #{institute,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
schoolname = #{schoolname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scholar = #{scholar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, validationState = #{validationstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sch_id = #{schId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, institute = #{institute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, schoolname = #{schoolname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scholar = #{scholar,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
